abstract: Private schools in Westchester County and New Jersey are less expensive and far less competitive in admissions than those in New York City, and some will soon offer buses for students coming from New York City.
snippet: Private schools in Westchester County and New Jersey are less expensive and less competitive in admissions, and some will soon offer buses to and from New York City.
lead_paragraph: Private schools in Westchester County and New Jersey are less expensive and less competitive in admissions, and some will soon offer buses to and from New York City.

headline.main: Private Schools in Suburbs Tap Manhattan Market
headline.print_headline: Private Schools In Suburbs Tap Urban Market
headline.seo: Suburban Private Schools Appeal to Manhattan Parents
